text: Sigrid Maurer (Sigrid V. "Sigi" Maurer, 19 March 1985 Rum, Tyrol) is an Austrian politician, and former student representative, (GRAS). From 2013 to 2017, she was a member of the Austrian Greens. == Life == Maurer studied music and political science at the University of Innsbruck from 2004 to 2009. She graduated from the University of Vienna with a Bachelor of Arts. Since 2005, Maurer has been involved in the Austrian Students Union and became a member of the Green & Alternative Students (GRAS). From October 2013 to November 2017, she was a member of the National Council. In the 2019 Nationalrat election, she is running for the Vienna Greens on the third list in the state constituency of Vienna. == References == == External links == * Official website Category:Living people Category:1985 births Category:People from Tyrol (state) Category:Members of the National Council (Austria) Category:Austrian women in politics Category:The Greens – The Green Alternative politicians Category:21st-century Austrian politicians Category:21st-century women politicians Category:University of Innsbruck alumni Category:University of Vienna alumni
title: Sigrid Maurer
